ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 5
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake Hunt Part 5: The Joes' attempted rescue of Snake Eyes is called off by the Department of Defense. The Dreadnoks complete their rescue of Destro and Baroness, then propose an alliance. Some of the Joes prepare unauthorized rescue missions for Snake Eyes - while virtually every Joe in the Pit requests a leave of absence, intending the same.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 11:54:43. [CVDB736375] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:57. [Issue ID 2066822]
